content:
Web-public stream created by Matteo Capucci (he/him). Description:

A stream dedicated to ACT22 conversations (web public & publicly archived)
How do I give a talk at ACT 2022 via zoom?

How do I find the zoom link? I registered, and I got a message from "Receipt from the University of Strathclyde Online Shop" confirming this, but it doesn't contain a zoom link. Nothing on the conference webpage says how I'll get this link.

Since I'm giving my talk at 6:00 on Monday, I don't want to be floundering around at 5:30 trying to get the link!

Will it show up in my email?
